Home --> Documentations --> PJMEDIA Reference

Samples: Playing AVI File to

Video and Sound Devices

This is a very simple example to use the AVI File Player, Sound Device Port, and PJMEDIA_VID_PORT. In this example, we open the file, video, and sound devices, then connect the file to both video and sound devices to play the contents of the file.

This file is pjsip-apps/src/samples/aviplay.c

48 /*
49  * aviplay.c
50  *
51  * PURPOSE:
52  * Play a AVI file to video and sound devices.
53  *
54  * USAGE:
55  * aviplay FILE.AVI
56  */

59 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO != 0)
60 
61 #include "util.h"
62 
63 /* For logging purpose. */
64 #define THIS_FILE "aviplay.c"
65 
66 static const char *desc =
67 " FILE \n"
68 " \n"
69 " aviplay.c \n"
70 " \n"
71 " PURPOSE \n"
72 " \n"
73 " Demonstrate how to play a AVI file. \n"
74 " \n"
75 " USAGE \n"
76 " \n"
77 " aviplay FILE.AVI \n";
78 
79 struct codec_fmt {
80  pj_uint32_t pjmedia_id;
81  const char *codec_id;
82  /* Do we need to convert the decoded frame? */
83  pj_bool_t need_conversion;
84  /* If conversion is needed, dst_fmt indicates the destination format */
85  pjmedia_format_id dst_fmt;
86 } codec_fmts[] = {{PJMEDIA_FORMAT_MJPEG, "mjpeg",
87  PJ_TRUE , PJMEDIA_FORMAT_I420},
88  {PJMEDIA_FORMAT_H263 , "h263" ,
89  PJ_FALSE, 0},
90  {PJMEDIA_FORMAT_MPEG4, "mp4v"},
91  {PJMEDIA_FORMAT_H264 , "h264"}
92  };
93 
94 typedef struct avi_port_t
95 {
96  pjmedia_vid_port *vid_port;
97  pjmedia_snd_port *snd_port;
98  pj_bool_t is_running;
99  pj_bool_t is_quitting;
100 } avi_port_t;
101 
102 typedef struct codec_port_data_t
103 {
104  pjmedia_vid_codec *codec;
105  pjmedia_port *src_port;
106  pj_uint8_t *enc_buf;
107  pj_size_t enc_buf_size;
108 
109  pjmedia_converter *conv;
110 } codec_port_data_t;
111 
112 static pj_status_t avi_event_cb(pjmedia_event *event,
113  void *user_data)
114 {
115  avi_port_t *ap = (avi_port_t *)user_data;
116 
117  switch (event->type) {
118  case PJMEDIA_EVENT_WND_CLOSED:
119  ap->is_quitting = PJ_TRUE;
120  break;
121  case PJMEDIA_EVENT_MOUSE_BTN_DOWN:
122  if (ap->is_running) {
123  pjmedia_vid_port_stop(ap->vid_port);
124  if (ap->snd_port)
125  pjmedia_aud_stream_stop(
126  pjmedia_snd_port_get_snd_stream(ap->snd_port));
127  } else {
128  pjmedia_vid_port_start(ap->vid_port);
129  if (ap->snd_port)
130  pjmedia_aud_stream_start(
131  pjmedia_snd_port_get_snd_stream(ap->snd_port));
132  }
133  ap->is_running = !ap->is_running;
134  break;
135  default:
136  return PJ_SUCCESS;
137  }
138 
139  /* We handled the event on our own, so return non-PJ_SUCCESS here */
140  return -1;
141 }
142 
143 static pj_status_t codec_get_frame(pjmedia_port *port,
144  pjmedia_frame *frame)
145 {
146  codec_port_data_t *port_data = (codec_port_data_t*)port->port_data.pdata;
147  pjmedia_vid_codec *codec = port_data->codec;
148  pjmedia_frame enc_frame;
149  pj_status_t status;
150 
151  enc_frame.buf = port_data->enc_buf;
152  enc_frame.size = port_data->enc_buf_size;
153 
154  if (port_data->conv) {
155  pj_size_t frame_size = frame->size;
156 
157  status = pjmedia_port_get_frame(port_data->src_port, frame);
158  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) goto on_error;
159 
160  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_decode(codec, 1, frame,
161  (unsigned)frame->size, &enc_frame);
162  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) goto on_error;
163 
164  frame->size = frame_size;
165  status = pjmedia_converter_convert(port_data->conv, &enc_frame, frame);
166  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) goto on_error;
167 
168  return PJ_SUCCESS;
169  }
170 
171  status = pjmedia_port_get_frame(port_data->src_port, &enc_frame);
172  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) goto on_error;
173 
174  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_decode(codec, 1, &enc_frame,
175  (unsigned)frame->size, frame);
176  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) goto on_error;
177 
178  return PJ_SUCCESS;
179 
180 on_error:
181  pj_perror(3, THIS_FILE, status, "codec_get_frame() error");
182  return status;
183 }
184 
185 static int aviplay(pj_pool_t *pool, const char *fname)
186 {
187  pjmedia_vid_port *renderer=NULL;
188  pjmedia_vid_port_param param;
189  const pjmedia_video_format_info *vfi;
190  pjmedia_video_format_detail *vfd;
191  pjmedia_snd_port *snd_port = NULL;
192  pj_status_t status;
193  int rc = 0;
194  pjmedia_avi_streams *avi_streams;
195  pjmedia_avi_stream *vid_stream, *aud_stream;
196  pjmedia_port *vid_port = NULL, *aud_port = NULL;
197  pjmedia_vid_codec *codec=NULL;
198  avi_port_t avi_port;
199 
200  pj_bzero(&avi_port, sizeof(avi_port));
201 
202  status = pjmedia_avi_player_create_streams(pool, fname, 0, &avi_streams);
203  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
204  PJ_PERROR(2,("", status, " Error playing %s", fname));
205  rc = 210; goto on_return;
206  }
207 
208  vid_stream = pjmedia_avi_streams_get_stream_by_media(avi_streams,
209  0,
210  PJMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO);
211  vid_port = pjmedia_avi_stream_get_port(vid_stream);
212 
213  if (vid_port) {
214  pjmedia_vid_port_param_default(&param);
215 
216  status = pjmedia_vid_dev_default_param(pool,
217  PJMEDIA_VID_DEFAULT_RENDER_DEV,
218  &param.vidparam);
219  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
220  rc = 220; goto on_return;
221  }
222 
223  /* Create renderer, set it to active */
224  param.active = PJ_TRUE;
225  param.vidparam.dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_RENDER;
226  param.vidparam.flags |= PJMEDIA_VID_DEV_CAP_OUTPUT_WINDOW_FLAGS;
227  param.vidparam.window_flags = PJMEDIA_VID_DEV_WND_BORDER | PJMEDIA_VID_DEV_WND_RESIZABLE;
228  vfd = pjmedia_format_get_video_format_detail(&vid_port->info.fmt,
229  PJ_TRUE);
230  pjmedia_format_init_video(&param.vidparam.fmt,
231  vid_port->info.fmt.id,
232  vfd->size.w, vfd->size.h,
233  vfd->fps.num, vfd->fps.denum);
234 
235  vfi = pjmedia_get_video_format_info(
236  pjmedia_video_format_mgr_instance(),
237  vid_port->info.fmt.id);
238  /* Check whether the frame is encoded */
239  if (!vfi || vfi->bpp == 0) {
240  /* Yes, prepare codec */
241  pj_str_t codec_id_st;
242  unsigned info_cnt = 1, i, k;
243  const pjmedia_vid_codec_info *codec_info;
244  pj_str_t port_name = {"codec", 5};
245  pj_uint8_t *enc_buf = NULL;
246  pj_size_t enc_buf_size = 0;
247  pjmedia_vid_dev_info rdr_info;
248  pjmedia_port codec_port;
249  codec_port_data_t codec_port_data;
250  pjmedia_vid_codec_param codec_param;
251  struct codec_fmt *codecp = NULL;
252 
253  /* Lookup codec */
254  for (i = 0; i < sizeof(codec_fmts)/sizeof(codec_fmts[0]); i++) {
255  if (vid_port->info.fmt.id == codec_fmts[i].pjmedia_id) {
256  codecp = &codec_fmts[i];
257  break;
258  }
259  }
260  if (!codecp) {
261  rc = 242; goto on_return;
262  }
263  pj_cstr(&codec_id_st, codecp->codec_id);
264  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_find_codecs_by_id(NULL,
265  &codec_id_st,
266  &info_cnt,
267  &codec_info,
268  NULL);
269  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
270  rc = 245; goto on_return;
271  }
272  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_get_default_param(NULL, codec_info,
273  &codec_param);
274  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
275  rc = 246; goto on_return;
276  }
277 
278  pjmedia_format_copy(&codec_param.enc_fmt, &param.vidparam.fmt);
279 
280  pjmedia_vid_dev_get_info(param.vidparam.rend_id, &rdr_info);
281  for (i=0; i<codec_info->dec_fmt_id_cnt; ++i) {
282  for (k=0; k<rdr_info.fmt_cnt; ++k) {
283  if (codec_info->dec_fmt_id[i]==(int)rdr_info.fmt[k].id)
284  {
285  param.vidparam.fmt.id = codec_info->dec_fmt_id[i];
286  i = codec_info->dec_fmt_id_cnt;
287  break;
288  }
289  }
290  }
291 
292  /* Open codec */
293  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_alloc_codec(NULL, codec_info,
294  &codec);
295  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
296  rc = 250; goto on_return;
297  }
298 
299  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_init(codec, pool);
300  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
301  rc = 251; goto on_return;
302  }
303 
304  pjmedia_format_copy(&codec_param.dec_fmt, &param.vidparam.fmt);
305  codec_param.dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_DECODING;
306  codec_param.packing = PJMEDIA_VID_PACKING_WHOLE;
307  status = pjmedia_vid_codec_open(codec, &codec_param);
308  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
309  rc = 252; goto on_return;
310  }
311 
312  /* Alloc encoding buffer */
313  enc_buf_size = codec_param.dec_fmt.det.vid.size.w *
314  codec_param.dec_fmt.det.vid.size.h * 4;
315  enc_buf = pj_pool_alloc(pool, enc_buf_size +
316  128 /*< padding, required for vid codecs
317  such as ffmpeg. Must be >=
318  AV_INPUT_BUFFER_PADDING_SIZE.
319  And must not be included in
320  the enc_buf_size calculation
321  above. */);
322 
323  /* Init codec port */
324  pj_bzero(&codec_port, sizeof(codec_port));
325  status = pjmedia_port_info_init2(&codec_port.info, &port_name,
326  0x1234,
327  PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING,
328  &codec_param.dec_fmt);
329  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
330  rc = 260; goto on_return;
331  }
332  pj_bzero(&codec_port_data, sizeof(codec_port_data));
333  codec_port_data.codec = codec;
334  codec_port_data.src_port = vid_port;
335  codec_port_data.enc_buf = enc_buf;
336  codec_port_data.enc_buf_size = enc_buf_size;
337 
338  codec_port.get_frame = &codec_get_frame;
339  codec_port.port_data.pdata = &codec_port_data;
340 
341  /* Check whether we need to convert the decoded frame */
342  if (codecp->need_conversion) {
343  pjmedia_conversion_param conv_param;
344 
345  pjmedia_format_copy(&conv_param.src, &param.vidparam.fmt);
346  pjmedia_format_copy(&conv_param.dst, &param.vidparam.fmt);
347  conv_param.dst.id = codecp->dst_fmt;
348  param.vidparam.fmt.id = conv_param.dst.id;
349 
350  status = pjmedia_converter_create(NULL, pool, &conv_param,
351  &codec_port_data.conv);
352  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
353  rc = 270; goto on_return;
354  }
355  }
356 
357  status = pjmedia_vid_port_create(pool, &param, &renderer);
358  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
359  rc = 230; goto on_return;
360  }
361 
362  status = pjmedia_vid_port_connect(renderer, &codec_port,
363  PJ_FALSE);
364  } else {
365  status = pjmedia_vid_port_create(pool, &param, &renderer);
366  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
367  rc = 230; goto on_return;
368  }
369 
370  /* Connect avi port to renderer */
371  status = pjmedia_vid_port_connect(renderer, vid_port,
372  PJ_FALSE);
373  }
374 
375  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
376  rc = 240; goto on_return;
377  }
378  }
379 
380  aud_stream = pjmedia_avi_streams_get_stream_by_media(avi_streams,
381  0,
382  PJMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO);
383  aud_port = pjmedia_avi_stream_get_port(aud_stream);
384 
385  if (aud_port) {
386  /* Create sound player port. */
387  status = pjmedia_snd_port_create_player(
388  pool, /* pool */
389  -1, /* use default dev. */
390  PJMEDIA_PIA_SRATE(&aud_port->info),/* clock rate. */
391  PJMEDIA_PIA_CCNT(&aud_port->info), /* # of channels. */
392  PJMEDIA_PIA_SPF(&aud_port->info), /* samples per frame. */
393  PJMEDIA_PIA_BITS(&aud_port->info), /* bits per sample. */
394  0, /* options */
395  &snd_port /* returned port */
396  );
397  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
398  rc = 310; goto on_return;
399  }
400 
401  /* Connect file port to the sound player.
402  * Stream playing will commence immediately.
403  */
404  status = pjmedia_snd_port_connect(snd_port, aud_port);
405  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
406  rc = 330; goto on_return;
407  }
408  }
409 
410  if (vid_port) {
411  pjmedia_vid_dev_cb cb;
412 
413  pj_bzero(&cb, sizeof(cb));
414  avi_port.snd_port = snd_port;
415  avi_port.vid_port = renderer;
416  avi_port.is_running = PJ_TRUE;
417  pjmedia_vid_port_set_cb(renderer, &cb, &avi_port);
418 
419  /* subscribe events */
420  pjmedia_event_subscribe(NULL, &avi_event_cb, &avi_port,
421  renderer);
422 
423  if (snd_port) {
424  /* Synchronize video rendering and audio playback */
425  pjmedia_vid_port_set_clock_src(
426  renderer,
427  pjmedia_snd_port_get_clock_src(
428  snd_port, PJMEDIA_DIR_PLAYBACK));
429  }
430 
431 
432  /* Start video streaming.. */
433  status = pjmedia_vid_port_start(renderer);
434  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
435  rc = 270; goto on_return;
436  }
437  }
438 
439  while (!avi_port.is_quitting) {
440  pj_thread_sleep(100);
441  }
442 
443 on_return:
444  if (snd_port) {
445  pjmedia_snd_port_disconnect(snd_port);
446  /* Without this sleep, Windows/DirectSound will repeteadly
447  * play the last frame during destroy.
448  */
449  pj_thread_sleep(100);
450  pjmedia_snd_port_destroy(snd_port);
451  }
452  if (renderer) {
453  pjmedia_event_unsubscribe(NULL, &avi_event_cb, &avi_port,
454  renderer);
455  pjmedia_vid_port_destroy(renderer);
456  }
457  if (aud_port)
458  pjmedia_port_destroy(aud_port);
459  if (vid_port)
460  pjmedia_port_destroy(vid_port);
461  if (codec) {
462  pjmedia_vid_codec_close(codec);
463  pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_dealloc_codec(NULL, codec);
464  }
465 
466  return rc;
467 }
468 
469 #ifndef _MSC_VER
470 static void sig_handler(int sig)
471 {
472  switch (sig)
473  {
474  case SIGINT:
475  case SIGTERM:
476  break;
477  }
478  puts("exit..");
479  exit(1);
480 }
481 #endif
482 
483 static int main_func(int argc, char *argv[])
484 {
485  pj_caching_pool cp;
486  pj_pool_t *pool;
487  int rc = 0;
488  pj_status_t status = PJ_SUCCESS;
489 
490  if (argc != 2) {
491  puts("Error: filename required");
492  puts(desc);
493  return 110;
494  }
495 
496 #ifndef _MSC_VER
497  signal(SIGINT, sig_handler);
498  signal(SIGTERM, sig_handler);
499 #endif
500 
501  /* Must init PJLIB first: */
502  status = pj_init();
503  PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 120);
504 
505  /* Must create a pool factory before we can allocate any memory. */
506  pj_caching_pool_init(&cp, &pj_pool_factory_default_policy, 0);
507 
508  /* Create memory pool for our file player */
509  pool = pj_pool_create( &cp.factory, /* pool factory */
510  "AVI", /* pool name. */
511  4000, /* init size */
512  4000, /* increment size */
513  NULL /* callback on error */
514  );
515 
516  pjmedia_video_format_mgr_create(pool, 64, 0, NULL);
517  pjmedia_converter_mgr_create(pool, NULL);
518  pjmedia_event_mgr_create(pool, 0, NULL);
519  pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_create(pool, NULL);
520 
521  status = pjmedia_vid_dev_subsys_init(&cp.factory);
522  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
523  app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Video init failed", status);
524  rc = 130;
525  goto on_return;
526  }
527 
528  status = pjmedia_aud_subsys_init(&cp.factory);
529  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
530  rc = 140;
531  goto on_return;
532  }
533 
534 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENH264_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENH264_CODEC != 0
535  status = pjmedia_codec_openh264_vid_init(NULL, &cp.factory);
536  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
537  rc = 150;
538  goto on_return;
539  }
540 #endif
541 
542 #if PJMEDIA_HAS_FFMPEG_VID_CODEC
543  status = pjmedia_codec_ffmpeg_vid_init(NULL, &cp.factory);
544  if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
545  rc = 160;
546  goto on_return;
547  }
548 #endif
549 
550  rc = aviplay(pool, argv[1]);
551 
552  /*
553  * File should be playing and looping now
554  */
555 
556  /* Without this sleep, Windows/DirectSound will repeteadly
557  * play the last frame during destroy.
558  */
559  pj_thread_sleep(100);
560 
561 on_return:
562 #if PJMEDIA_HAS_FFMPEG_VID_CODEC
563  pjmedia_codec_ffmpeg_vid_deinit();
564 #endif
565 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENH264_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENH264_CODEC != 0
566  pjmedia_codec_openh264_vid_deinit();
567 #endif
568  pjmedia_aud_subsys_shutdown();
569  pjmedia_vid_dev_subsys_shutdown();
570 
571  pjmedia_video_format_mgr_destroy(pjmedia_video_format_mgr_instance());
572  pjmedia_converter_mgr_destroy(pjmedia_converter_mgr_instance());
573  pjmedia_event_mgr_destroy(pjmedia_event_mgr_instance());
574  pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_destroy(pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_instance());
575 
576  /* Release application pool */
577  pj_pool_release( pool );
578 
579  /* Destroy pool factory */
580  pj_caching_pool_destroy( &cp );
581 
582  /* Shutdown PJLIB */
583  pj_shutdown();
584 
585  /* Done. */
586  return rc;
587 }
588 
589 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
590 {
591  return pj_run_app(&main_func, argc, argv, 0);
592 }
593 
594 #else
595 
596 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
597 {
598  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(argc);
599  PJ_UNUSED_ARG(argv);
600  puts("Error: this sample requires video capability (PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO == 1)");
601  return -1;
602 }
603 
604 #endif /* PJMEDIA_HAS_VIDEO */

pjmedia_format_init_video
void pjmedia_format_init_video(pjmedia_format *fmt, pj_uint32_t fmt_id, unsigned width, unsigned height, unsigned fps_num, unsigned fps_denum)

pjmedia_clock_src * pjmedia_snd_port_get_clock_src(pjmedia_snd_port *snd_port, pjmedia_dir dir)
pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_find_codecs_by_id
pj_status_t pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_find_codecs_by_id(pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr *mgr, const pj_str_t *codec_id, unsigned *count, const pjmedia_vid_codec_info *p_info[], unsigned prio[])
PJ_ASSERT_RETURN

pj_caching_pool

pj_status_t pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr_dealloc_codec(pjmedia_vid_codec_mgr *mgr, pjmedia_vid_codec *codec)

pjmedia_frame::size
pj_size_t size
Definition: frame.h:60
converter.h
Format conversion utilities.
pjmedia_port::info
pjmedia_port_info info
Definition: port.h:379
pjmedia_aud_stream_stop
pj_status_t pjmedia_aud_stream_stop(pjmedia_aud_stream *strm)
pjmedia_vid_dev_info
Definition: videodev.h:316
pj_pool_release
void pj_pool_release(pj_pool_t *pool)
pjmedia_aud_subsys_init
